about_the_game:
You, a childless monarch, are dying. Without a successor, your kingdom is at risk of descending into chaos. Spend your last days searching for the next ruler of your domain. As you meet people from across your kingdom and beyond, some will seek your help and judgment, while others will try to stir trouble or even seize the throne for themselves.
Will you make the right choices?
And will you be able to accept that there is no such thing?

Successor To Your Throne is a short experimental narrative focused game, with a large number of ways the story can unfold, my aim is to create a game where the story is structureless and completely player driven via choices and actions.

The Demo will show you all systems and play-space possible, the only difference is the amount of content available, which will impact the time you can spend in each run.

Features Include

  • Reactive story, all scenes are made and presented based on the impact your choices and actions have on the world and the characters that inhabit it
  • 51 Ending Tokens to unlock as you discover all the different paths the story can unfold
  • A cast of 10 unique characters to meet, deal with and pick your successor from
  • 5 different factions of your nation to manage throughout your journey

I will be focusing on bug-fixes and will most likely leave it at that unless demand is high.

Best place to talk to me about anything is Email or Discord!

Much Love,
Adam
